text1: Crystals have already created technological advances.
text2: All of the advances ascribed to crystals are due to their physical properties. This doesn't imply that they have useful metaphysical properties.

text1: Metaphysical speculation from the Scholastic Theologians to Sir Francis Bacon lead to the formulation of the modern scientific method. plato.stanford.edu
text2: Methaphysics has been studied for thousands of years, and yet its discoveries barely affected the world. Physics has been performed from 17th century, and it boosted our technology substantially.
